item.title: FSP-Laplace: Function-Space Priors for the Laplace Approximation in Bayesian Deep Learning
item.description: FSP-LAPLACE efficiently integrates interpretable function-space priors into Bayesian deep learning via a novel Laplace approximation, significantly improving uncertainty estimates and model performanc…

item.title: Treatment of Statistical Estimation Problems in Randomized Smoothing for Adversarial Robustness
